arts.ttl: Patrik Schick scores four as Bayer Leverkusen thrash Freiburg in five-star performance
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen secure a commanding 5-1 victory over Freiburg, thanks to four goals from Patrik Schick and another from Florian Wirtz in a dominant display for their final game of the year. The breakthrough finally came in stoppage time of the first half, as Patrik Schick latched onto a pass from Wirtz and delicately chipped the ball over Atubolu to give Leverkusen a 1-0 lead at the break.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Bayer Leverkusen 5-1 SC Freiburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen ended their historic year in style as they saw of SC Freiburg 5-1 to end the calendar year with only one loss domestically. A very much Leverkusen dominated…

arts.ttl: Leverkusen sign Hincapie to contract extension: "On par with Messi and Salah."
arts.sum: Shortly before kickoff in this evening's "Top-Spiel", defending Bundesliga champions Bayer 04 Leverkusen confirmed a contract extension for Ecuadorian international Piero Hincapie.

arts.ttl: Issa Traore: Bayer Leverkusen beat out PSG to sign Mali's top talent
arts.sum: They were one of the surprise teams at the U17 World Cup in 2023. Mali, coached by Soumaila Coulibaly, reached the semifinal of the tournament and, after losing to France, beat Argentina in...

arts.ttl: Saturday's Bundesliga predictions including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Freiburg
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Boniface has extended his Leverkusen contract, report claims
arts.sum: Victor Boniface has signed a new deal with Bayer Leverkusen, according to Ligainsider.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Freiburg preview: Reigning champions hoping to continue red-hot form
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to claim an eighth consecutive victory when they face Freiburg at the BayArena in Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga market values: Harry Kane drops by 10% - Jamie Gittens most valuable Dortmund player
arts.sum: With one matchday to go before the winter break, Transfermarkt has updated the market values of 493 Bundesliga players, and the two most valuable players in the league became even more valuable....

arts.ttl: Preview: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Bayer Leverkusen and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz: The return of the majestic number 10
arts.sum: No player in the Bundesliga has completed as many dribbles this season (61 percent), showing that regardless of whether confronted by a strong press, Wirtz will get himself into a promising position in front of goal more than half the time. Wirtz is able to beat the press before playing a fantastic pass to create a four-against-two situation.
